snippet: Lindsey Vonn’s request to compete in a men’s World Cup downhill race has been rejected by the International Ski Federation.
abstract: Request by women's champion Lindsey Vonn to compete in men’s World Cup downhill race is rejected by International Ski Federation.
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn’s request to compete in a men’s World Cup downhill race has been rejected by the International Ski Federation.

headline.seo: Skier Vonn Can’t Race Against Men in World Cup
headline.main: Skier Vonn Can’t Race Against Men in World Cup
